description: Madagascar and Southwest Indian Ocean Islands including Seychelles, Comoros, Mascarenes
name: Malagasy

description: including the bulk of Eurasia and North Africa
name: Palearctic

description: including Australia, New Guinea, and neighboring islands. The northern boundary of this zone is known as the Wallace line.
name: Australasia

description: including the Indian subcontinent and Southeast Asia
name: Indomalaya

description: Pacific Ocean islands including Polynesia, Melanesia, Micronesia.
name: Oceania

description: including South America and the Caribbean
name: Neotropical
